LoginScreenForgotPasswordButton.hint: Tap this button for navigation to Forgot Password page.
LoginScreenForgotPasswordButton.label: Forgot Password

LoginScreenSignInButton.hint: Tap this button for Sign In.
LoginScreenSignInButton.label: Sign In

ForgotPasswordCancelButton.hint: Tap this button to Cancel your Request. And Return to Login Screen.
ForgotPasswordCancelButton.label: Cancel

ForgotPasswordSaveButton.hint: Tap this button to Proceed your Request. And Return to Login Screen after updation of the data.
ForgotPasswordSaveButton.label: Submit

ForgotPasswordDescriptionLabel.hint: Enter your email address below and we will send you a link with a new password.

SelectLanguageButton.hint: Tap this button to change the language
SelectLanguageButton.label: Select Language
